data.name: A_ExitArgs
data.comment: A list of different names which will stop the application. The elements are seperated using the A_ExitSep variable. At least 1 element should be in the list.

data.name: A_ExitSep
data.comment: The seperated between the exit commands in the A_ExitArgs list.

data.name: A_WindowName
data.value: Multimedia Retrieval - K. Westerbaan & G. de Jonge
data.comment: The title of the window which will be created by the application.

data.name: EX_NoMesh
data.comment: The exception which is given when a mesh is being retrieved which is not stored in our library.

data.name: F_DateFormat
data.comment: The format which is being used to visualise dates on exported files.

data.name: F_File_Measure
data.comment: The format for the names of measurement/statistic files.

data.name: I_EndLoad_Mesh
data.comment: Notify the user that meshes have finished loading in for visualisation.

data.name: I_EndProc_Clean
data.comment: Notify the user that old data has been deleted.

data.name: I_EndProc_Evaluate
data.comment: Notify that the evaluation of query results have finished.

data.name: I_EndProc_Feature
data.comment: Notify the user that the descriptors for all shapes have been calculated.

data.name: I_EndProc_Input
data.comment: Notify the end of input argument conversion.

data.name: I_EndProc_Measure
data.comment: Notify that the meshes have finished being measured for statistic calculation.

data.name: I_EndProc_Query
data.comment: Notify the user that the query pipeline has ended.

data.name: I_EndProc_Refine
data.comment: Notify that the meshes have finished processing.

data.name: I_Evaluation_Exp
data.comment: Notify that evaluation results have been saved to a specified file.

data.name: I_ExitPropmt
data.value: Press enter to exit the application.
data.comment: Notify that an action needs to be taken to close the application.

data.name: I_Feature_Exp
data.comment: Notify that the featuress have been saved to a specified file.

data.name: I_Feature_Imp
data.comment: Notify that the features have been reloaded from the specified file.

data.name: I_Measure_Exp
data.comment: Notify that the measurements have been saved to a specified file.

data.name: I_QueryCount
data.comment: Notify the user about the amount of query results which have been generated by the application.

data.name: I_Query_Exp
data.comment: Notify that the query results have been saved to a specified file.

data.name: I_Query_Imp
data.comment: Notify that the query results from a previous attempt have been reloaded.

data.name: I_ShapeCount
data.comment: Notify the user about the amount of shapes which have been loaded before enumerating the list.

data.name: I_ShapeSelect_Prompt
data.value: Please select a shape, or write down {0} to exit the program.
data.comment: Notify that an action needs to be taken to view a specific shape or exit the application.

data.name: I_StartLoad_Mesh
data.comment: Notify the user that meshes are being loaded in for visualisation.

data.name: I_StartProc_Clean
data.comment: Notify the user that old data is being deleted.

data.name: I_StartProc_Evaluate
data.comment: Notify that the evaluation process has started calculating metrics on the query results.

data.name: I_StartProc_Feature
data.comment: Notify the user that the descriptors for all shapes are being calculated.

data.name: I_StartProc_Input
data.comment: Notify that the conversion of input arguments is in process.

data.name: I_StartProc_Measure
data.comment: Notify that the meshes are now being measured for statistic calculation.

data.name: I_StartProc_Query
data.comment: Notify that the query pipeline has started.

data.name: I_StartProc_Refine
data.comment: Notify that the meshes are now being processed.

data.name: I_StartUp
data.comment: Notify that the application has started up.

data.name: I_UnknownCommand
data.comment: Notify the user that the given action cannot be completed by this application.
